text.text-intro: Welcome to Laborless Laundry's Scheduler. I'm Ava, an Automated Virtual Assistant! %s
text.text-goodbye: Alright! you're all set, %n. We'll pick up on %d around %t at %a. Thanks for choosing Laborless!
text.text-ignore: Sorry, I'm all booked up right now. Please try again later!
text.text-error: I'm sorry, I didn't catch that. %s

questions.question-1: Would you like DRY CLEANING or WASH AND FOLD?
questions.question-2: What day would you like us to pick up? (Please respond with a day of the week in all caps, like MONDAY)
questions.question-3: Which of these times would you like (please copy format exactly):
questions.question-4: Where should we pick it up? (Please enter a full address, including zip code)
questions.question-5: Remind me of your first name?
